ISSUE.TITLE: "All plugins and themes" page design issue (with logos)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Actually the same issue as described at https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/4488. But now on the "All plugins and themes" page. But in this case we cannot remove the logo column. So we have to adjust width of columns

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4970 Fixed the field alignment on the vendor details page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4767 Fixed "All plugins and themes" page design issue
